question: in Main Show of 2017 MTV Europe Music Awards, when did goosebumps by the featuring artist that is pictured in black and white, come out?
context: "Goosebumps" (styled as "goosebumps" on the album) is a song by American rapper Travis Scott. It serves as the third single from his second studio album Birds in the Trap Sing McKnight. It was sent to rhythmic radio on December 13, 2016 by Grand Hustle Records and Epic Records. The song features vocals from American rapper Kendrick Lamar.
